participant_1.background:
I'm so clumsy that I even trip over my own feet sometimes.
i made my first movie when i was 18.
I love the sweet and juicy flavor of watermelon.
I check my to do list to see what's for the day.
i work in a used book store.

participant_2.background:
I got to know my neighborhood better by walking dogs.
I love the sound of a classic car engine, it's like music to my ears.
I find my well-organized life to be a stress reliever after a busy day.
i m easily agitated.
I recall fondly the days I used to spend running around with my friends, pretending to be superheroes.

content.text: Hey! How has your day been so far?
It's been going good so far. I just got back from walking the dogs in my neighborhood.
Cool, that's a great way to get some exercise. I'm about to head to work at my used book store.
Oh nice! I love used bookstores. I used to spend hours in them when I was younger.
Me too! I love the smell of old books. I also love the feeling of finding a great deal on a book you've been wanting to read.
Me too! I've found some really amazing books at used bookstores.
What are some of your favorite books?
I love anything by Stephen King, Dean Koontz, and Stephenie Meyer.
Oh nice! I love Stephen King and Dean Koontz too. I've never read anything by Stephenie Meyer though.
You should definitely check her out! She's a great author.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! Have a great day at work!
